lines.text: Before Christ was a time of orgies. Then came love.
Probably. In orgies you give your all. No more, no less. In love, it's never enough. It's always too much or not enough.
I didn't believe in the world. I never had. I've always known it was a bad dream.
Luxury cars are dead. The future is in trucks.
It's a question of age. You still have several lives ahead of you. I'm not unhappy, though. In fact, I think I'm happier than ever before.
